Member Function Documentation

Scale::sForProject ( $  projId,
$  limitToOrderGreaterThan0 = true 
)

Performs a raw sql query for performance, then parses the results for what we want raw sql, so does not return data for models in the hasMany list

Parameters:
$projId project id to find scales in
$limitToOrderGreaterThan0 only retrieve those that are displayed in patient-viewable pages
Returns:
array of scale id's and names
